text: Kapena iye amene adadutsa Mumzinda umene udaonongeka ndi kusanduka bwinja ndipo adanena kuti: “Kodi Mulungu angapereke moyo bwanji ku Mzinda pamene utafa?” Motero Mulungu adamupha iye ndipo patatha zaka zana limodzi Iye adamuukitsa kwa akufa. Mulungu adati: “Kodi iwe wakhala chifere nthawi yotani?” Iye adati: “Mwina tsiku limodzi kapena maola owerengeka basi.” Mulungu adati: “Iyayi, iwe wakhala zaka zana limodzi. Taona chakudya chako ndi chakumwa chako, sizinasinthe ayi ndipo taona bulu wako! Ife tikusandutsa kuti ukhale chizindikiro kwa anthu. Ndipo taona mafupa m’mene timawaikira pamodzi ndi kuwakuta ndi mnofu.” Ndipo pamene zonse zinaonetsedwa kwa iye, iye adati: “Ndadziwa tsopano kuti Mulungu ali ndi mphamvu pa chinthu china chilichonse.”
